content: the jewel crop top pattern is a uniquely designed crop top having a somewhat necklace shape it easy to make and works up super fast it s great for beach fun it s beginner friendly as it makes use of simple crochet stitches this pattern has a video tutorial on youtube available via the link below https //youtu be/sdkugtjrzoa si=gpek8fu92xddmjdr materials dk weight yarn 4 0 4 5 and 5 5 mm crochet hooks stitch markers this pattern has been thoroughly tested ***buy more save more no codes needed get 10% discount when you purchase 2 patterns at once get 15% discount when you purchase 3 patterns at once get 20% discount when you purchase 4 patterns at once get 25% discount when you purchase 5 patterns at once get 40% discount when you purchase 10 or more patterns at once*** this is a pdf pattern and not a finished product it is a copyright issue of toyslab creations you are free to sell whatever you make from this pattern but you can t sell share or modify part or all of the pattern if you have any questions about the pattern contact me via email happy crocheting
